title: Ep. 418: When fans care more than the 'creators' | Paypal Unbans me
itunes:title: When fans care more than the 'creators' | Paypal Unbans me
description: In this episode of For Canon Sake, we talk about a fan made Gorr the God Butcher. We also discuss Paypal bans (and unbans).
